title: The girl singing in the video is not Elvis Presley’s grand-daughter
subtitle: The name of the girl singing 'It's Now or Never' in the video is Angelina Jordan. She is not the grand-daughter of legendary singer Elvis Presley.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on Facebook with a claim that the girl singing in the video is Elvis Presley’s grand-daughter. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post.

Claim: The granddaughter of Elvis Presley singing ‘It’s Now or Never’. Fact: The name of the girl singing in the video is Angelina Jordan and she is not the grand-daughter of legendary singer Elvis Presley. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the screenshot of the girl from the video was run through the Google Reverse Image Search, a link to a website with a similar image of the girl can be found in the search results. According to the ‘See it Live’ website, the girl in the video is Angelina Jordan, a 13-year-old singer from Norway. In the video, she was singing “It’s Now or Never” for a show at Fredricksten Castle in Halden, Norway. She was the winner of “Norway’s Got Talent” (Norske Talenter) in 2014. More information about her can be found on her website.

When checked for the names of grand-daughters of Elvis Presley, it was found that he did not have any grand-daughter with the name Angelina Jordan. He has three grand-daughters (Riley Keough, Harper Vivienne Ann Lockwood, and Finley Aaron Love Lockwood).

To sum it up, the girl singing in the video is not Elvis Presley’s grand-daughter. She is Angelina Jordan, a Norwegian singer.
